strings:
<se_def>Marcello: What are you doing here?
Have you found Dhoulmagus?
No? Then get to it!

<se_def>Marcello: Well, well.
What brings you here?

<se_def>Marcello: Hm...
You're looking for the Moonshadow harp?
The name certainly rings a bell...
<se_def>Marcello: Of course! I read about it in a book we received from the Kingdom of Ascantha.

<se_def>Marcello: Why are you looking for it, anyway?
What a strange thing to be doing.

<se_def>Marcello: Oh, so you found that Moonshadow harp?
I'm very pleased for you, I'm sure.

<se_def>Marcello: But you're supposed to be finding Dhoulmagus!
Just concentrate on the task at hand for once.
<se_def>Marcello: You certainly seem to have an awful lot of time on your hands.
<se_def>Marcello: Even if that really is the Moonshadow harp, which I very much doubt, what exactly do you expect me to do about it?

<se_def>Marcello: Why are travellers always such strange folk?
It's beyond me. But I suppose that's the nature
of strangers...ah ha ha!

<se_def>Marcello: I'm sure I read about the Moonshadow harp
in a book we received from the Kingdom
of Ascantha.

<se_def>Marcello: But why are you looking for it?
What a strange thing to be doing.
